step_feedback.feedback: Good job keeping your shoulders and elbows relatively stable. Try to keep your wrists a bit straighter in this position.
Your shoulder and elbow positions are good. Focus on keeping your wrists straighter as you stretch your arms overhead.
You're doing well with the shoulder and elbow movements. For the next repetitions, try to make a tighter fist and squeeze your shoulder blades together more firmly.
Your shoulders are well-positioned. Work on keeping your elbows straighter and your wrists more neutral as you extend your arms overhead.

Your shoulders are in a good spot. For the next set, focus on a more controlled exhale and relaxing your muscles fully as you return to the starting position. Pay attention to keeping your wrists straighter.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Push Down Pumping exercise! Remember to keep your wrists straighter and focus on squeezing your shoulder blades together. This helps build strength and promotes lymph drainage effectively.
